Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_06.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "Night creeps over the isle of flowers, gradually devouring the lifeless campus beneath the twilight's shadow."}
{3: 'Deep within the ruins, atop the academic building where wails of anguish echo...'}
{3: "Leaning against the rust-stained railing, the girl's gaze is drawn to the flower-like lights in the distant sky."}
{2: '???', 3: 'Even when freed from the mortal coil, their souls refuse to cross to the other side...'}
{2: '???', 3: "With the world in such a state, what's the point of hiding in their shells and merely existing?"}
{2: '???', 3: 'When the wind rises, they will fall like wheat in the field.'}
{3: "As strands of hair slide across her cheek, the girl's crimson eyes flicker slightly."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_05.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: "Something lurking in the building's shadows slowly emerges into the light."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Sorry, I didn't mean to spy on you. I just wanted to check on you."}
{2: '???', 3: "Every part of this vessel is your handiwork. What's there to check?"}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Even authors have slight inconsistencies when writing the same character in different stories. I just want to be responsible.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...What exactly are you?'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "In human terms, I suppose you'd call me a Red Tide creature?"}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I did help you, at least. Why so apathetic?'}
{3: 'The girl looks down at her own body, letting out a scornful laugh.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Still better than that sickly state you were in before.'}
{2: '???', 3: "You only did it because I have some value I'm unaware of, right?"}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'You could interpret it that way, but why not think of it as an invitation instead?'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Where to, and for what?'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Shh—listen...'}
{3: "Cradle closes her eyes and smiles. Faint sounds of tides and whispers begin to echo in the girl's ears."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'The children of the Red Tide are eager to meet you.'}
{2: '???', 3: "...I'd rather not, at least not now."}
{3: 'The girl turns around, gripping the railing as she gazes down at the building below.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I still have unfinished business.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: "Rest assured that you will have some time to prepare before the feast. That's a basic courtesy, after all. Besides, I'm not fond of stories that are cut short halfway through."}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'But when you continue this story, may I watch from the sidelines?'}
{2: '???', 3: 'If you can keep quiet enough.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Of course.'}
{3: 'Cradle gives a gentle smile as she retreats into the shadows. Before completely vanishing, she pauses for a moment.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Oh, right, there is one thing I should remind you of.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Even with my power merged into you, your "heart" still cannot pump enough "blood" through your veins.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'Meaning...'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'There is a limit to your powers.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'If you overdo it, you might not even be able to maintain this form.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'However, if you were to fully merge with the Red Tide and become one of us, such limitations would no longer exist.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'That is none of your concern.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'When this place collapses, I will do as you wish.'}
{2: 'Cradle', 3: 'I look forward to our next encounter.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_05.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Cradle disappears as silently as she came, leaving no trace of her presence.'}
{3: 'Only the girl is left behind on the desolate rooftop.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'What an... unlikeable person.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Just like me.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Adjustment Operator', 3: 'Good... the basic compatibility training went smoothly. All readings are excellent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Adjustment Operator', 3: 'Of course, there are still many adjustments that need follow-up. I recommend you come back for a few more visits.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "I appreciate the offer, but there's someone rather impatient waiting for me outside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'll just ask you directly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why the sudden need to switch me to a new frame, and why such a tight schedule for compatibility testing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria briefly looks away.'}
{3: 'Yata knows this gesture means she does not want to answer the question directly.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shorthalt is dead, and Scarab needs a new captain.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "That doesn't count as an answer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I can't be like that guy—always running his mouth and sticking his nose where it doesn't belong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'In battle, I either charge straight ahead or make a quick retreat when things get dicey.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'All that stuff about assessing combat situations, coordinating battle formations, leading the team through encirclements...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Not to mention comforting kids and dealing with drunk robots—I don't have any of these leadership qualities. Not a single one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm more comfortable with the simple things like hunting down some poor bastard with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata crosses her arms and turns away in irritation.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Whatever.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No matter how unwilling she might be, Yata has no choice but to follow Valeria's orders—she is the commandant, after all."}
{3: "But the expected order never comes, and Yata can't help but turn her head to look..."}
{3: 'Valeria slowly pulls a few liquor-filled mint candies from her coat pocket.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm not Shorthalt either. Don't try to bribe me with these things.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata snatches the candy with a huff, tears open the wrapper, and pops it into her mouth in one go.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If you got me this new frame just so I could take over, I suggest you ask for a refund right now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "You're overthinking it, I wouldn't push you that far. The squad just got a new mission.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The Red Tide is gathering around an artificial island. Scarab needs to investigate the cause of this unusual movement.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...Do you realize what kind of scenario you're describing?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata stops chewing.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Even if Shorthalt was still here, this isn't something we could just casually take on, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "That's exactly why I got you the new frame.", 4: '2'}
{3: "After a moment's thought, Yata carefully folds the candy wrapper and hands it back to Valeria."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Is it too late to reject it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "...You've already signed for it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As she speaks, Valeria pulls out her tactical terminal and begins synchronizing the mission data.'}
{3: "Yata sighs and begins reviewing the intel. As she flips through the pages, Valeria's voice suddenly cuts through."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Scarab needs a new captain.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata remains silent, only turning to leave after she finishes reading through the entire mission brief.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "We'll talk when I come back.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata pauses by the trash bin, about to throw away the candy wrapper. After a moment's hesitation, she holds it up briefly with her back to Valeria, then tucks it away."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You can't just placate me with this thing. Like I said, I'm not him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...I'm not Shorthalt.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia Core Area', 2: 'Lunch Break - Clear Skies', 4: 'High Security Area - War Conference Room'}
{3: 'Away from the bustling corridors, inside the War Conference Room that bears the highest security clearance level...'}
{3: 'Holographic projections thoroughly cover every door and window, while the soundproofing system operates as normal.'}
{3: 'Two figures sit facing each other, seemingly deep in an intense discussion.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Two task force squads have lost contact at the same location twice in a row.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'They were both deployed for... a low-risk area survey?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hilda rubs her nose, flips to the next page of the briefing, and steals a glance at Nikola sitting across from her.'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Given the current situation, it\'s hard to see how this mission could be classified as "low-risk".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Commander, do you have any thoughts on this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The risk ratings for military missions have always been nothing but classifications on paper.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If all battlefields can match our expectations, we'd call them training exercises instead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'So what did they encounter on this so-called "battlefield"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Initially, Squad A was only ordered to track the Red Tide's movements.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'During their mission, they discovered an artificial island in the Western Pacific, marked as "Hydrangea"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Hydrangea Artificial Island?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'It was named after the hydrangeas that grow abundantly on the island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'As a precautionary measure, Squad A made the decision to land and investigate the island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '72 hours after Squad A landed on the island, Babylonia lost all contact with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "That's why Squad B was sent to search for them. Soon after, they too went dark.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'One after another, they all went silent. Were they infected? Or perhaps...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We can't rule out the possibility of infection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'First of all, we lack any intelligence about that area. We know absolutely nothing about the surface conditions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Secondly, the Red Tide's movements in the area have been suspicious. Recently, it seems to be converging on the island.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'The Red Tide is converging on the island?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Can I take it that something on that island is causing these anomalies?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Apparently so. Two squads wouldn't vanish one after another for no reason.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "However, Commander, there are still some questions I'd like you to answer.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hilda casually flips back several pages, following the creases she made earlier.'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'According to this briefing, Squad A sent a distress signal to Babylonia after they went missing...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'After landing on the island, Squad B briefly established contact with them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'However, when Squad B approached the coordinates of the distress signal, Squad A suddenly went dark.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'After that, both squads went completely silent.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What are you implying?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Even from a layman's perspective, this bears all the hallmarks of a premeditated ambush.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Furthermore, I don't believe infected Constructs could maintain this level of intelligence.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'This is just my speculation, but could there be a possibility that Squad A had defected?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "It's possible, but the likelihood is low.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Defectors don't usually broadcast their betrayal—the Purifying Force's retribution is nothing to scoff at.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'It makes little sense for Squad A to launch a counterattack against Squad B right after their mission, especially right under our surveillance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If we assume defection as the motive, Squad A's actions would be incredibly foolish.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "That's why you didn't immediately deploy the Purifying Force.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...News of Construct defection would be extremely sensitive in the current climate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Of course. That's precisely why we're meeting today.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'The emergency confidentiality protocol I signed thirty minutes ago is now in effect. All information regarding this incident has been temporarily classified.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "I can't say how long this information blackout will remain effective...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "With two squads missing, I'm certain Kurono's informants have already begun to move.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "But before we make any formal decisions, I trust you've gathered sufficient intel about the mission location.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Let's return to discussing the island since you claim it's the source of our problems...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'We may have insufficient information on hand, but there must be records of that artificial island during the Golden Age.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'As you predicted, I do have some historical documents on hand.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The Hydrangea Artificial Island was once a military fortress used for large-scale weapons testing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'After the experiments concluded, the island was approved for commercial redevelopment with profit in mind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Universal Toys and many other tech giants saw the potential, jointly investing in the renovation project.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Several colleges and their affiliated research institutes were established on the island, creating an integrated hub for education, research, and campus life...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'As a model of elite education during the Golden Age, it aimed to nurture the next generation of scientific talents.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'However, the Hydrangea Artificial Island was abandoned following the Punishing Virus outbreak.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'An academy island, huh...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'In that era of excess educational resources...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'I thought liberal education policies had already been widely implemented across the world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'But... there was also an opposing trend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The reality is, opportunists exist in every era.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Those who weaponize knowledge want their children to wield the power to control the world, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This was especially true for those who came to this island—they were both scientists and parents to their own children.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'So what exactly was being taught on Hydrangea Island? Or rather, what was being researched?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Their publicly announced research direction is the development of smart technology for public use.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Practical smart technology applications? How conveniently simple.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "But if you take a closer look at the island's personnel roster...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You'll see that the scientists stationed there were all elite researchers in their respective fields, most of whom held radical research philosophies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Take the island\'s "ordinary" high school, Misono High School, for example—it had a teacher-to-student ratio of 2:1.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Two teachers per student on average—there's no reasonable explanation for such a ratio.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Was education merely a front? What exactly is it that they were trying to do?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hilda takes out her tablet and swiftly types in several keywords with practiced efficiency.'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Hm... According to a non-disclosed investigation report from the Science Council, large portions of the project's funding were unaccounted for.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'The auditor from the accounting firm during the Golden Age was killed in a car accident during the investigation...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Actually, there's something that's been bothering me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Reika Saotome, Technical Director and Scientific Advisor of the Hydrangea Island Project.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Reika... Saotome?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Hilda's expression clouds with confusion at the unfamiliar name."}
{3: "Nikola's desk terminal rings with an incoming call."}
{3: 'Nikola exchanges a quick glance with Hilda before answering the call.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Make it quick. I'm busy.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Reika Saotome. How much do you know about this name?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Wasted potential.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Care to elaborate?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I don't know what you've discovered, but I wouldn't waste time on this if I were you.", 4: '13'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Oh? From what I know, she was a prodigy who earned her doctorate at a young age, with expertise spanning mathematics, horticulture, life sciences, computer science, and mechanical engineering...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Even during the Golden Age, she had already proposed and implemented her theory of "memory projection".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It\'s "consciousness projection".', 4: '13'}
{3: 'Asimov corrects Nikola without hesitation.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's a branch of consciousness connection technology, developed from its basic framework but with certain unique functional characteristics.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This theory once sparked considerable debate in mainstream academia and even generated quite a few scandals.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Scandals?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'It violated humanitarian principles by repeatedly conducting human experiments with unauthorized medicines.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'And then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And then nothing. If she had made any real breakthroughs, the file would have been filled with her achievements. You wouldn't have had to call and ask me.", 4: '13'}
{3: "Asimov shakes his head, looking like he's explaining something completely mundane."}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "If you're interested, why not subscribe to the Science Council's back issues? The entries of these seemingly valuable but ultimately meaningless theories alone will keep you busy until breakfast tomorrow.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Is there no future at all for this technology?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Theoretically, yes. I've read that paper, and if its proposed vision were to become reality, it would indeed be beneficial to us.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But as you should know, even as outsiders to the field, academic papers can be full of hot air, and they never appeared in any journals after that anyway.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'In all likelihood, they hit a complete dead end with their research direction and abandoned the project entirely.', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That might not be the case. At least your colleagues don't share that opinion.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Nikola forwards his documents to Asimov, specifically highlighting an entry about the Science Council's unaccounted funds."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Project Hydrangea Island...', 4: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...I can help, but you'll need to adjust the schedule yourselves.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "We'll need more manpower and resources to handle another project...", 4: '13'}
{3: 'Asimov pauses briefly as the sound of conversation comes through from the other end of the line.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...and my time as well. Let's leave it at that for now. Contact me when there's progress.", 4: '13'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '13'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Did you hear all that, Hilda?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Crystal clear.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'A genius or a madman, a potential revolutionary or an enemy of the world.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I've been thinking... there's a possibility that the island still harbors the prototype of some illegal experiment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'It was that very prototype that triggered consequences beyond our prediction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'Are you worried Reika Saotome might still be alive?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'm worried that her secret research on that island has awakened something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: 'The Red Tide is converging on the island...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hilda closes her eyes and draws in a sharp breath.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'I fear the Red Tide has disrupted some kind of balance on the island.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "If what you're saying is true, then we've got a serious problem on our hands.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "Let's dispatch another squad. We still have time before the confidentiality protocol expires.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'This will be yet another dangerous gamble.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "And we might lose all the bargaining chips we've gotten so far.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hilda', 3: "I'll maintain information control within the agreed timeframe. The rest is up to your discretion, sir.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She gives Nikola a slight nod before standing up and leaving.'}
{3: 'He massages his temples, before switching his terminal to an encrypted channel.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "It's me. What's the mission target?", 4: '2'}
